price: 8. (Markaasuu Alle yidhi) waa intaasoo Rabbigiin idiin naxariisto (haddaad toobad keentaan), haddiise aad mar kale u noqotaan (xumo fal), waxaanu Annaguna sidoo kale u noqon (Ciqaabidda). Waxaana uga dhignay Jahannama gaalada gogol.
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يَرۡحَمَكُمۡۚ وَإِنۡ عُدتُّمۡ عُدۡنَاۚ وَجَعَلۡنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ حَصِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ʿasā rabbukum an yarḥamakum wa-in ʿudttum ʿud'nā wajaʿalnā jahannama lil'kāfirīna ḥaṣīran
